title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Experiments related to Material Behaviour, Experimental Stress Analysis, and Experimental Analysis of Structures

title: Concepts taught in class
text: Experiments are all designed to deal with testing and verification of material and structural properties of metals and alloys

title: Student Opinion
text: The experiments are of a higher level than theory covered in class so one must be prepared with the concepts for understanding the experiment clearly

title: How to Crack the Paper
text: Pay attention to the theory sessions
